description: This file implements the state-access functions and property management for the Slap Environment Controller object, including getters for interfaces and internal components, pending call info retrieval, property get/set/reset, and object reset functions. It appears to be part of an implementation for the SLAP (Service Logic Aggregation Plane) framework, supporting internal state management and interface access.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapEcoGetSlapUoaIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the handle to the Slap UOA interface associated with the environment controller object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapEcoGetSlapBssIf(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the handle to the Slap BSS interface associated with the environment controller object.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapEcoGetSlapObjMapper(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the handle to the object mapper component of the environment controller.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapEcoGetSlapVarConverter(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the handle to the variable converter component.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapEcoGetSlapVarMapper(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the handle to the variable mapper component.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapEcoGetSlapDefContainer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Returns the handle to the default container component.

methods.name: BOOL SlapEcoGetPendingCallInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char ** call_name,ULONG * call_timestamp,ULONG * call_age)
methods.description: Retrieves information about a pending call, including its name, initiation timestamp, and age.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoGetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Copies the current property configuration of the environment controller into a provided property structure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoSetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hProperty)
methods.description: Sets the environment controller's properties from a provided property structure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoResetProperty(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets the environment controller's properties to default values.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapEcoReset(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Resets the environment controller's internal state, including deleting all associated containers.
